objective: To build things that make people smile

descriptions: Built web applications and pushed them to production, utilizing Github for version control
Contributed to several Open-Source projects and worked with others on pushing solutions for edge-cases
Used HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, and Express.js to develop full web applications
Implemented new functions to the Open-Source Software and pushed them to production
Ran a small team who helped to keep the website functional and in order
Used Ruby on Rails to have site functional and working well with federation
